mapper.select: SELECT commentCount from goods where id = #{goodsId}

SELECT c.id, c.username, c.userlevel, c.score, c.content, c.createtime FROM `goodscomment` c where c.goodsId = 1 AND c.createtime <= (SELECT createtime from `goodscomment` where goodsId = 1 ORDER BY createtime DESC LIMIT 2000, 1) ORDER BY c.createtime DESC LIMIT 5;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goodscomment(userId, goodsId, username, userlevel, score, content, createtime) VALUES(#{userId}, #{goodsId}, #{username}, #{userlevel}, #{score}, #{content}, SYSDATE())
mapper.update: UPDATE goodscomment SET score = #{score}, content = #{content} where id = #{id}
